Class CarTransport<T extends LoadableCar>

java.lang.Object
Vehicle
CarTransport<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasBed, Moveable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ferry
public class CarTransport<T extends LoadableCar> extends Vehicle implements HasBed
Object class for constructing a CarTransport super with its specific features.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CarTransport(int nrDoors, double enginePower, Color color, String modelName, Point2D point)
    For example you can construct a 300 horse-power, two-door, blue CarTransport with start position in (0, 0).

  • Constructor Details

    • CarTransport

      public CarTransport(int nrDoors, double enginePower, Color color, String modelName, Point2D point)
      For example you can construct a 300 horse-power, two-door, blue CarTransport with start position in (0, 0).
      Parameters:
      nrDoors - Number of doors that your car transport should have.
      enginePower - Enter the specific engine power of your car transport.
      color - Color of the car transport.
      modelName - The specific model name for the car transport.
      point - Sets the initial starting point of your car transport.

  • Method Details

    • loadCargo

      public void loadCargo(T cargo)
      Adds a car to the car transport bed.
      Parameters:
      cargo - Takes in the car you want to load.

    • unloadCargo

      public T unloadCargo() throws IllegalStateException
      Unloads a car from the car transport.
      Returns:
      The unloaded car.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If the bed is not at the lower position or no cars loaded then we can't unload.
